column4: Can anyone help me with this problem? I'm trying to run play movies and i get A/V desync.... any one know who to fix it..... I've just started with ubuntu
enabling framedrop on a slow machine can help.
you need ubuntu-restricted-extras and libdvdcss2 to play dvds.
install ubuntu-restricted-extras with Synaptic, and go to medibuntu.org to install libdvdcss2 and w32codecs while you're at it.
